MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML1  postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:30pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Fir Park substation to investigate the fault. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:51pm on Sunday, 06 December 2020
